page.title: 07Paul's Life in Ripon
page.content: I like to go to the park where the river flows.I like to go for walks round the school. My dad takes me for walks around the county side.I like going on bike rides round the park.Every time I go to the park my friends are there.There is a difference between the two parks.The river park has just a swing and a slide.But the other park is bigger and it has more things to play on.Some times I like to go up to Hairy Mountains because there are trees and bushes.Once I found a piece of metal there. It was sharp at the corners.I tripped on it and fell down. I hurt my self.Sometimes, I go to the shop for my nan.Sometimes, I like going out shopping for my mum;there is a butcher and a VG grocers shop. Written by Paul Barnett aged 10 years.
